column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////So incredibly delicious! The service was very professional and quick. Â They treat it like an experience
column2: which it definitely was! We arrived at about 530pm
column3: and waited about 30 minutes for a table. We had drinks at the bar
column4: and watching the bartenders work was amazing! We had the shortrib stroganoff
column7: and the Mexican corn. No complaints here! They also have a nice cocktail and bar selection. We enjoyed the Bavette's punch and champagne splash.
